comment.author: Tanner
comment.text: Life without the Clinton's dominating us would be so great.

replies.author: Kylie
replies.text: She's not going to dominate us she going to make this country stronger than ever

replies.author: Tanner
replies.text: When a real warning is given, a deep consideration is needed and a wise decision needs to be made. Why? Because no one wants to live in regret.

replies.author: Sean
replies.text: Kylie Dyson ..."She's not going to dominate us ..she going to make this country stronger than ever"... WHAT the F**K kind of drugs R U ON?????

replies.author: Tanner
replies.text: You don't have to swear your head off and be antagonistic just to make a point.
